pages.text: $(li)The Farmer is a expert of the agriculture.$(br)$(li)It will trade you Pumpkin Pie, Gooseberry Jam Cookies, Bananas, Passionfruit, Banana Cakes, Suspicious Stew or even Golden Carrots and Glistering Melon Slice for Emeralds.$(br)$(li)A Villager can get the Farmer profession if is near of a Composter.
